document.full_text: a colorado woman accused of killing a family of five in a car crash was warned after suffering a seizure in 2006 not to drive until she was seen by a neurologist, according to court documents released on monday.
document.title: woman charged in colorado crash was told not to drive
lines_and_colors: a colorado woman accused of killing a family of five in a car crash was warned after suffering a seizure in 2006 not to drive until she was seen by a neurologist, according to court documents released on monday.
